terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: The E-Landing Card app allows travellers to prepare their declaration on a mobile device prior to their arrival in Malaysia.

step1.title: Step 1 : Create Profile
step1.description: Single or Multiple profiles can be created.

step2.title: Step 2 - Answer Questions
step2.description: Questions related to Travel and Goods are presented.

step3.title: Step 3 - Review
step3.description: Review entered details and confirm declaration.

step4.title: Step 4 - QR Code
step4.description: A QR Code is generated on your mobile device to be scanned upon Entry into Malaysia.
